wikipedia_page.main: Alan Walter Whiteside OBE (born in Nairobi, Kenya, on 18 March 1956) is a South African academic, researcher and professor at the Balsillie School of International Affairs and professor emeritus at the University of KwaZulu-Natal. He is well known for his innovative work in the field of the social impacts of HIV and AIDS.

response: * Alan Whiteside: South African academic, researcher and professor, especially known for his work on Aids in Africa.Alan Whiteside
* Alan Whiteside, AIDS researcher and author
